title: Emerald Bloom Pendant - A Touch of Telugu Elegance
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Crafted with our signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Features an intricate filigree design reminiscent of traditional Telugu artistry, surrounding a lush oval-cut Emerald. Accented with sparkling CZ stones. Delicate gold bead dangles add a touch of whimsy. This pendant seamlessly blends traditional South Indian motifs with a modern silhouette.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings (pellilu)
and traditional ceremonies. Its versatile design makes it equally suitable for contemporary events and everyday wear
adding a touch of South Indian heritage to any outfit.
description: A stunning fusion of tradition and modernity, this pendant showcases exceptional craftsmanship and the timeless beauty of natural Emeralds. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance. This piece makes a thoughtful gift and a cherished heirloom for generations to come. Own a piece of South Indian heritage with this exquisite Emerald Bloom Pendant.
